text:
SMRT taking over Jurong West Bus Package in a few days (from 1 Sep 2024)

Air conditioned Integrated Transport Hub located next to Boon Lay MRT Station and Jurong Point Shopping Mall.

Lots of feeder services going NTU and around the western area of Singapore.  I find that ITHs are quite dim, especially the bus park. They should make the area more vibrant and play some music.

Quite crowded went there on a Monday around 6pm.

Bus number 174 SG 5369S
the air con was so horrible
not feel the air con
very warm /come out sweat
please do something!!
Government increase the transportation $$$
so please do some thing about it
I hope this bus interchange can be cleaned regularly! There are always leftover cans, rubbish, stains on or around the only seats given along B11-B15. Very inconvenient ðŸ˜•
Bus SG5009G Service 154 on 29 Jan towards Boon Lay. Watching video while driving

An air-conditioned bus hall where you can barely feel the air-conditioning.

But at least there are giant LED screens constantly playing annoying ads.

Welcome to the fooootureeee.
